topics.body:
Well I've got a unique awkward problem.

My older sister asked if I could share my Crunchyroll Premium account with her, and me being the doormat I am, let her. I just discovered that Crunchyrool keeps track of your viewing history. Anyone care to guess what I recently got into and what site I used to watch it?
[spoiler]!http://images.kpopstarz.com/data/images/full/393810/monster-musume-key-art.jpg!
I AM SO VERY FUCKING FUCKED IF SHE FINDS OUT I WATCH THIS!!![/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fde01d7945b70057c00024d

id say its at least on par with Panty and Stocking

topics.body:
"@Virgil Stormblade":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55aeed4d63687214c7001254#post_55aeed4d63687214c7001254
[bq="Virgil Stormblade"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55aeece563687279ac00000a#post_55aeece563687279ac00000a
Say, you like Ghost in the Shell. Should I watch the film, or should I watch Stand Alone Complex? [/bq]
Watch the first movie; Stand alone complex is good but it takes the entire season to understand the plot and is a massive time investment.


Watch the first movie, then watch the second movie, then watch Stand Alone Complex.
